page.title: 01EAST PRESTON AND KINGSTON.
page.content:
{E}njoyable walks. {A}griculture and antiques. {S}chools. {T}axis and tennis.
{P}ubs,parks and playing fields. {R}estaurants and rest homes. {E}asy access by rail and road. {S}hopping. {T}asty fish. {O}ld flint buildings. {N}urseries. {* * * { P}eople who have lived in the parish since the 1920s, tell us that untill the end of the 1940-45 war this area was an agricultural village with fields stretching from the Downs to the shingle-beach. {T}he first Domesday Book gives a record of farming at {PRESTETUNE}, {
